DataElement.preferredName: Nodal Increase Diameter Confirmation Assessment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator for information related to the assessment to confirm the presence of increased nodal disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the assessment to confirm the presence of increased nodal disease.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Nodal; of or pertaining to a node, any bulge or swelling of an anatomical structure or part.

Concepts.definition: Of or pertaining to a node, any bulge or swelling of an anatomical structure or part.

Property.preferredDefinition: Increase; a process of becoming larger or more numerous or more important.:Diameter; the length of a straight line passing through the center of a circle and connecting two points on the circumference.:Having been established or verified.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A process of becoming larger, more numerous, more important, or more likely.
The length of a straight line passing through the center of a circle or sphere and connecting two points on the circumference.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to Alliance for by script Fri Oct 25 15:25:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
